commands.name: az containerapp env logs show
commands.summary: Show past environment logs and/or print logs in real time (with the --follow parameter).
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env logs show [--follow {false, true}]
                              [--ids]
                              [--name]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--subscription]
                              [--tail]
examples: az containerapp env logs show -n MyEnvironment -g MyResourceGroup
az containerapp env logs show -n MyEnvironment -g MyResourceGroup --follow --tail 30
